title: Enchanting Rose Gold Mangalsutra with Diamond Flowers
features: Delicate rose gold chain interspersed with traditional black beads (Nalla Pusalu) and embellished with five sparkling floral-shaped diamond pendants. The design offers a modern take on the classic Mangalsutra, suitable for everyday wear while honoring tradition.
description: A beautiful blend of tradition and contemporary style. Crafted with high-quality diamonds and 18k rose gold, this Mangalsutra is both elegant and durable. Its delicate design makes it perfect for daily wear. A symbol of love and commitment, reimagined for the modern woman.
